column10: Crossing Blake south with driver turning left on Edgelea blocking crosswalk; driver turning left onto Blake from Platten nearly hit me in the crosswalk (vision blocked by other car)
Crossing S across Blake from Edgelea to Platten; crossed first 2 westbound lanes and Edglelea turn lane fine, had to stop in street at east bound (4th) lane as car approaching failed to yield
Driver turning left onto Blake from Platten nearly hit me as I crossed Blake in the. Crosswalk
Crossing Blake south from Edgelea to Platten and got stuck in third lane of 5 with drivers failing to yield

Crossing Cyrandall Valley Rd from E to W and hesitated to enter the crosswalk as there was a car waiting to turn right onto Blake. Driver's eyes and attention was entirely on the traffic approaching to his left, and he never looked right. Accelerated through crosswalk without ever looking to his right - would have been hit had I entered the crosswalk as the driver did not look to see if his path was clear before accelerating.
column21: There is no stop bar or marked crosswalk at this intersection.

column10: Crossing N to S and got stuck standing in turn lane with Eastbound drivers failing to yield in near passing a driver who had stopped for me in far lane
